definitions.definition: To make slippery or smooth (normally to minimize friction) by applying a lubricant .
examples: If your bicycle chain is squeaking you should lubricate it.

definitions.definition: To cause someone to become drunk , especially to make them more sociable or talkative .

main_definition: To make slippery or smooth (normally to minimize friction) by applying a lubricant .
secondary_definitions: ( humorous ) To cause someone to become drunk , especially to make them more sociable or talkative .
